title: Monika Saves The Universe
description: Previously, our heroine has already saved the Earth from a space invasion by two alien rodent species. Now she is called upon to chair a peace conference between those species and Atlantis, a planet whose inhabitants had visited Earth in the distant past. Unfortunately, not all Atlanteans want peace. Throw in a failed stand-up comic from Atlantis who has organised a Marxist revolt on his home planet following a visit to London. Add a mix of dwarf pirates and giant blue aliens, plus the continuing will they, won't they threatened romance between Monika and her arresting police officer Tom, topped up with the presence of Amanda, Monika's nemesis from her school days, who also happens to be Tom's sister and the expected humorous chaos ensues.
author: E.D. Robson
